alert.note: Alert for Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 10:15AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Heavy downpours will impact portions of northeastern Windham, northeastern Tolland, south central Worcester, southeastern Hampden and northwestern Providence Counties through 1115 AM EDT... At 1012 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy downpours over Webster, or 13 miles south of Worcester, moving east at 10 mph. Doppler radar estimates 1 to 2.5 inches of rain has already fallen HAZARD...Minor street flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Webster, Southbridge, Auburn, Burrillville, Oxford, Uxbridge, Millbury, Charlton, Stafford, North Smithfield, Spencer, Dudley, Leicester, Putnam, Thompson, Sturbridge, Sutton, Douglas, Woodstock and Pomfret. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
